item.title: #en @ 1540412101243637760
item.description:
#OpenDataNYC features a list of Raised Crosswalk locations throughout NYC. Raised Crosswalks are a traffic calming street design that enhance pedestrian visibility while alerting drivers to travel at slower speeds.
Check out this #OpenData set online: https://t.co/4cjTsc56ox https://t.co/0jiPRQ5G0R
